Source code for bambu.api.menus

from bambu import navigation

"""
Provides a menu builder used by ``bambu.menu``.
"""


[docs]class APIMenuBuilder(navigation.MenuBuilder):

[docs]	def register_partials(self):
		return (
			{
				'name': 'api',
				'description': 'Adds a link to the API documentation'
			},
		)
	


[docs]	def add_to_menu(self, name, items, **kwargs):
		items.append(
			{
				'url': ('api:doc',),
				'title': u'Developers',
				'selection': 'develop'
			}
		)


navigation.site.register(APIMenuBuilder)
